## OptionalPropertyNamesOf type

Extract the property names of an object type that are optional

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OptionalPropertyNamesOf<T extends object> = Exclude<{
    [K in keyof T]: T extends Record<K, T[K]> ? never : K;
}[keyof T], undefined>;
```

## Example


```ts
const x: OptionalPropertyOf<{ a: string; b?: number }>; // 'b'

```
